sections.paragraph: இது, எப்படி, அது, ஒன்றொடொன்று. அவர், இப்படி, இங்கு, அங்கு, அதற்கு, இந்நாள், அந்த, இந்த, அதே, ஏற்ற - பிரதி பெயர்ச்சொல்
this, this one, here, which, this...that, the one...the other, another, such
b) (used in apposition to a substantive) this
2) on these conditions, herewith, thus provided, by, through this, for this cause, in this matter
4) as follows, things such as these, accordingly, to that effect, in like
5) from here, hence, on one side...on the other side
7) in spite of this, which, whence, how
Cognate: H2063, H2088
